snippet: The company that operated a fertilizer plant in the city of West, where an April explosion killed 15 people, faces $118,300 in federal fines, officials said Thursday.
abstract: Occupational Safety and Health Administration says West Fertilizer Co, which operated fertilizer plant in West, Tex, where April explosion killed 15 people, faces $118,300 in federal fines for safety violations.
lead_paragraph: The company that operated a fertilizer plant in the city of West, where an April explosion killed 15 people, faces $118,300 in federal fines, officials said Thursday.

headline.main: Texas: Fertilizer Plant in Deadly Blast Is Fined
headline.print_headline: Texas: Fertilizer Plant In Deadly Blast Is Fined
